description:
Bring your little person along for the ride. This rack-mounting seat lets you tote your toddler everywhere you go. Its adjustable and hadles weight well, so your co-rider won't outgrow it too quickly.

  • Rear rack-mounting, with quick release system
  • 5-point safety harness, with magnetic buckle
  • Padded seat, with water-repellent materials
  • Adjustable foot rests, with straps
  • Reflector
  • Recommended age: 9 months to 6 years
  • NOTE: Consult a pediatrician for babies under 1 year
name: Thule Yepp Nexxt Maxi Rack Mount
